mod.name: The Showman
mod.description: A tribute to the Original Slay the Spire Characters

cards.name: 52 Card Pickup
cards.description: Shuffle 2 random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: 52 Card Pickup+
cards.description: Shuffle 3 random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Ladies and Gentlemen...
cards.description:
Make a speech.
Draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.
Innate.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Ladies and Gentlemen...+
cards.description:
Make a speech.
Draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.
Innate.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Deal 11 damage.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Stage Hook+
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
Deal 14 damage.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Vanishing Defend+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Vanishing Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Vanishing Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Fleeting.

cards.description:
Draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Baffling Shuffle+
cards.description:
Draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Crashing Lights+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

Gain 15 Block.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Extra Wide Sleeves+

Gain 19 Block.
theshowman:Stacked.

Gain 6 Block.
When this card is Exhausted, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Flashy Flourish+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
When this card is Exhausted, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Full House

Deal 16 damage.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Full House+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Got Your Nose

Deal 12 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Got Your Nose+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Apply 3 Weak.

cards.name: Now You Don't
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Exhaust a random card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Now You Don't+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Exhaust a card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Now You See Me
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Exhaust a random card in your draw pile.

cards.name: Now You See Me+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Exhaust a card in your draw pile.

cards.name: One-Up
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If the enemy is Vulnerable, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: One-Up+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
If the enemy is Vulnerable, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Open The Curtain
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Open The Curtain+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

cards.name: Pocket Sand
cards.description: Apply 1 Weak and 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Pocket Sand+
cards.description: Apply 2 Weak and 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.description:
Draw 2 Cards.
Exhaust ALL Status and Curse Cards in your hand.

cards.name: Prestidigitation+
cards.description:
Draw 3 Cards.
Exhaust ALL Status and Curse Cards in your hand.

cards.name: Razzle Dazzle
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Razzle Dazzle+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sleeve Stash
cards.description:
Retain up to 1 cards this turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sleeve Stash+
cards.description:
Retain up to 2 cards this turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Sleighted Flourish
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
When this card is Exhausted, shuffle it and !theShowman:SecondMagic! random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Sleighted Flourish+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Vulnerable.
When this card is Exhausted, shuffle it and !theShowman:SecondMagic! random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Sleighted Hand
cards.description: Target enemy loses 6 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Sleighted Hand+
cards.description: ALL enemies lose 6 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Startling Showmanship
cards.description:
Apply 8 Vulnerable.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Startling Showmanship+
cards.description:
Apply 10 Vulnerable.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Wild Flourish
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
When this card is Exhausted, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Wild Flourish+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
When this card is Exhausted, deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Begone Thought
cards.description:
Innate.
At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand instead of discarding it.

cards.name: Begone Thought+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand instead of discarding it.
Then create and Exhaust a Daze for each card.

cards.name: Behind Curtain #3...
cards.description:
Select a theshowman:Class Card in your Exhaust Pile and add it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Behind Curtain #3...+
cards.description:
Select 2 theshowman:Class Cards in your Exhaust Pile and add them to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Black Jack
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage !theShowman:SecondMagic! times.
theshowman:Stacked.
( theshowman:Stacked only reduces damage on this card.)

cards.name: Black Jack+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage !theShowman:SecondMagic! times.
theshowman:Stacked.
( theshowman:Stacked only reduces damage on this card.)

cards.name: Bottom Deal
cards.description: Put a Skill or Attack from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Curtain Call
cards.description:
Whenever you Exhaust a card this turn, gain 3 Block.
Exhaust up to 2 cards in your hand.
Affected by modifiers to Block.

cards.name: Curtain Call+
cards.description:
Whenever you Exhaust a card this turn, gain 3 Block.
Exhaust up to 3 cards in your hand.
Affected by modifiers to Block.

cards.name: Dapper Flourish
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
When this card is Exhausted, gain 1 theshowman:Buffer this turn.

cards.name: Dapper Flourish+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage to ALL enemies.
When this card is Exhausted, gain 1 theshowman:Buffer this turn.

cards.name: Disembodied Hand
cards.description:
Exhaust a random card in your hand.
Play it at the start of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Disembodied Hand+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card in your hand.
Play it at the start of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Diverting Display
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.

cards.name: Diverting Display+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you Exhaust a card, apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy.

cards.name: Double Deal
cards.description: Put a Skill AND Attack from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Encore!
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Add a copy of the next card you play this turn to your hand.

cards.name: Encore!+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Add a copy of the next card you play this turn to your hand.

cards.name: Exaggerated Arm Sweeps
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
theshowman:Stacked.
theshowman:Stacked.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Exaggerated Arm Sweeps+
cards.description:
Deal 40 damage.
theshowman:Stacked.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Fist Full Of Cards
cards.description: Deal 4 damage for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Fist Full Of Cards+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage for each card in your hand.

cards.name: For My Next Trick!
cards.description:
Exhaust a card in your hand.
Next turn, add 2 copies to your hand that cost 1 less that turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: For My Next Trick!+
cards.description:
Exhaust a card in your hand.
Next turn, add 3 copies to your hand that cost 1 less that turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grand Gambit
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.
Draw that many cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Grand Gambit+
cards.description:
Exhaust any number of cards in your hand.
Draw that many cards +1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hare-Brained Scheme
cards.description:
Draw 6 cards.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Hare-Brained Scheme+
cards.description:
Draw 8 cards.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Hat Trick
cards.description: Gain 1 theshowman:Buffer this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Hat Trick+
cards.description: Gain 2 theshowman:Buffer this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Hype The Crowd
cards.description:
Gain 4 [E].
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Hype The Crowd+
cards.description:
Gain 5 [E].
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: It's Showtime
cards.description: Replay X random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile.

cards.name: It's Showtime+
cards.description: Replay X+1 random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile.

cards.name: Juxtaposed Juggling
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Vulnerability stacks additively for this attack.

cards.name: Juxtaposed Juggling+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Vulnerability stacks additively for this attack.

cards.name: Kibler Flick
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply that much Vulnerable.

cards.name: Kibler Flick+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply that much Vulnerable.

cards.name: Knock The Pile
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Look at the top 2 cards of your draw pile.
Exhaust any number of them.

cards.name: Knock The Pile+
cards.description:
Deal 17 damage.
Look at the top 4 cards of your draw pile.
Exhaust any number of them.

cards.name: Mischief Managed
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this deals unblocked damage to a Vulnerable enemy, gain temporary Strength next turn equal to that enemy's Vulnerable.

cards.name: Mischief Managed+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
If this deals unblocked damage to a Vulnerable enemy, gain temporary Strength next turn equal to that enemy's Vulnerable.

cards.name: Parlor Trick
cards.description:
Draw 10 Cards.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Parlor Trick+
cards.description:
Draw 10 Cards.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Presto!
cards.description:
Put a random non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Presto!+
cards.description:
Put a random non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile into your hand.
It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Prop Manacles
cards.description: Target Enemy loses 1 Strength this turn for each card in your Exhaust Pile.

cards.name: Prop Manacles+
cards.description: ALL Enemies lose 1 Strength this turn for each card in your Exhaust Pile.

cards.name: Prop Show
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 cards.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Prop Show+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 2 cards.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Reappearing Trick
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.
Shuffle ALL non-Curse, non-Status cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Reappearing Trick+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.
Shuffle ALL non-Curse, non-Status cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

cards.name: Second Act
cards.description:
Exhaust 2 cards in your hand.
Gain [E].

cards.name: Second Act+
cards.description:
Exhaust 2 cards in your hand.
Gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Sleeve Aces
cards.description:
Add a copy of a non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile to your discard pile and draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sleeve Aces+
cards.description:
Add 2 copies of a non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile to your discard pile and draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Stack The Deck
cards.description: At the end of your turn, put up to 1 card from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Stack The Deck+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, put up to 2 cards from your hand on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Strong Arm
cards.description:
Gain 9 Strength until the end of turn.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Strong Arm+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Strength until the end of turn.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Stupefy
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Add 8 Dazed to your hand.

cards.name: Stupefy+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Add 8 Dazed to your hand.

cards.name: Subtle Misdirections
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Status for the first time in a turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.

cards.name: Subtle Misdirections+
cards.description: Whenever you draw a Status for the first two times in a turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.

cards.name: Sybil Flourish
cards.description:
Gain 13 Block.
When this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Sybil Flourish+
cards.description:
Gain 18 Block.
When this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Three Card Monty
cards.description: Draw a card. Add 2 copies of it to your hand.

cards.name: Three Card Monty+
cards.description: Draw a card. Add 2 copies of it to your hand.

cards.name: Throwing Cards
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Throwing Cards+
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Toro!
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked, apply 2 Vulnerable to the attacker.

cards.name: Toro!+
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked, apply 3 Vulnerable to the attacker.

cards.name: Troubling Trope
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
Increase this card's damage by 1 this combat.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Troubling Trope+
cards.description:
Innate.
Deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
Increase this card's damage by 2 this combat.
Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

cards.name: Up My Sleeve
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Return a card from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

cards.name: Up My Sleeve+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Return a card from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

cards.name: Wardrobe Warding
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Retain up to 2 cards this turn.

cards.name: Wardrobe Warding+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.
Retain up to 4 cards this turn.

cards.name: Whirling Dervish
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies X times.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Whirling Dervish+
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies X times.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: A Gross Display
cards.description:
Innate.
Ethereal.
Deal 12 damage 12 times.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: A Gross Display+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 12 damage 12 times.
theshowman:Stacked.

cards.name: Columbify
cards.description: Replace an enemy with a Byrd this turn.

cards.name: Columbify+
cards.description: Replace an enemy with a Byrd this turn.

cards.name: Impromptu Flourish
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.
When you Exhaust this card, gain 8 Block and draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Impromptu Flourish+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.
When you Exhaust this card, gain 11 Block and draw a card.
theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Is THIS Your Card?
cards.description: For each card you have in your exhaust pile, deal 4 damage.

cards.name: Is THIS Your Card?+
cards.description: For each card you have in your exhaust pile, deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Maximum Distraction
cards.description: For every 3 stacks of Vulnerable an enemy has, they take an additional 25% damage.

cards.name: Maximum Distraction+
cards.description: For every 2 stacks of Vulnerable an enemy has, they take an additional 25% damage.

cards.name: Paradigm Sift
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Exhaust your draw pile and shuffle your Exhaust pile into your draw pile simultaneously.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Paradigm Sift+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Exhaust your draw pile and shuffle your Exhaust pile into your draw pile simultaneously.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Perfected Performance
cards.description: The first 2 cards you draw each turn theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Perfected Performance+
cards.description: The first 3 cards you draw each turn theshowman:Improvise.

cards.name: Potential Unleashed
cards.description:
Whenever you draw a card, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Potential Unleashed+
cards.description: Whenever you draw a card, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Set The Stage
cards.description: Draw until your hand is full.

cards.name: Set The Stage+
cards.description:
Draw until your hand is full.
Retain any number of cards this turn.

cards.name: Show Of Strength
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, at the start of next turn, gain 1 Strength until end of turn.

cards.name: Show Of Strength+
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain !theShowman:SecondMagic! Strength until end of turn and at the start of next turn, gain 1 Strength until end of turn.

cards.name: Showstopper
cards.description:
Replay in a random order, ALL theshowman:Class cards in your Exhaust pile.
Purge.

cards.name: Showstopper+
cards.description:
Replay in a random order, ALL theshowman:Class cards in your Exhaust pile.
Purge.

cards.name: Thespian Form
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, ALL on-Exhaust effects trigger 1 additional time.

cards.name: Thespian Form+
cards.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, ALL on-Exhaust effects trigger 2 additional times.

cards.name: Van De Graaff's Revenge
cards.description:
Deal 50 damage.
Add 5 Dazed to your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

cards.name: Van De Graaff's Revenge+
cards.description:
Deal 50 damage.
Add 3 Dazed to your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

cards.name: Vanishing Act
cards.description:
Remove a card from your hand and your deck.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Vanishing Act+
cards.description:
Remove 2 cards from your hand and your deck.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Ventriloquism
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, pick a random card in your Exhaust and draw pile.
When you play one for the first time this turn, play a copy of the other.

cards.name: Ventriloquism+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, pick a random card in your Exhaust and draw pile.
When you play one this turn, play a copy of the other.

cards.name: Willing Volunteer
cards.description:
The first attack that would hit you during the enemy's turn hits the targeted enemy instead.
Lasts until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Willing Volunteer+
cards.description:
The first two attacks that would hit you during the enemy's turn hits the targeted enemy instead.
Lasts until the start of your next turn.

relics.name: 3rd Time Charm
relics.description: Every 3rd card you play draws an additional card and Exhausts itself.
relics.flavorText: 33% of the time, it works, every time.

relics.name: Improv for Dummies Vol. 2
relics.description: The first 2 cards you draw each combat theshowman:Improvise.
relics.flavorText: The entire book is improvised by its author.

relics.name: Magnetized Gloves
relics.description: Increase your maximum hand size by 3.
relics.flavorText: Lets you hold on to more cards.

relics.name: Heart Of The Cards
relics.description: The first card you would theshowman:Overdraw each turn is instead played.
relics.flavorText: Believe in the heart of the cards!

relics.name: Millstone
relics.description: theshowman:Stacked reduces a card's effect by 2 less.

relics.name: Detachable Thumb
relics.description: Whenever you exhaust a card, it costs 0 until played.
relics.flavorText: A must have for every performer.

relics.name: Chaos Confetti
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first card you play each combat removes itself from your deck.
relics.flavorText: No performance is complete without some CHAOS CONFETTI!

relics.name: Trigon Of Trickery
relics.description: Replaces 3rd Time Charm. Every 3rd card you play Exhausts itself. Whenever you Exhaust a card, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: Tricks to trick even the trickiest of tricksters.
